summary: Fully colored all map markers except those undiscovered locations. You can see a great difference from the map after you reach the location.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Description[/size]

Fully colored all the map markers except those undiscovered locations. You can see a great difference from the map after you reach the location.

Thanks for all your suggestions. Especially some ideas are really appreciated. Thanks!

Sorry for my English. :) Some colors I am not sure how to describe. But you can see them in the newly uploaded pictures.

Btw, I haven\'t edit any gfx files, so these new icons will not display on compass. I will try to make this surport showing on compass in the future version.


v2:
Red: Dragon Lairs (the color of fire)
Black: Caves (no light or less light)
Grey: Tombs and Ruins (the color of stones)
Sea blue: Lighthouses and Ships (the color of sea)
Cambridge blue: Towns and Palaces
Deap bule: Holds
Amber: Stables, Houses, Windmills and Mines
Wine red: Shrines (the color of Oblivion)
Deep brown: Watch Towers, Gaint Camps and Orsimer Camps
Brown: Dwemer Ruins (the color of part of the walls)
Deep Green: Natural Sightseeing (the color of nature)
Beige: Doors
White: Imperial and Stormcloak Camps


v1:
[s]All the holds use blue.
Palaces and town use blue green.
Underground locations such as tombs, ruins and mines use orange.
Passes and graint camps use green.
Caves and caverns use deep green.
Small villages, windmills and stables use yellow.
Dragoin Lairs, shrines and guardian stones use red.
Watchtowers and all kinds of forts ues brown.
Lighthouse and boats use purple.
Moreover, doors use steel green.[/s]

=========================================

[size=5]Recommandation[/size]

I strongly recommand everyone to use Skyrim Compass Tuner with my mod together. The latest version 2.0 can be used to disable and enable any map marker on the map, which make the locations much easier to be found.

Here is the link: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=912

=========================================

[size=5]Installation[/size]

Extract the map.swf to your Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\interface, overwrite files if asked.


[size=5]Uninstallation[/size]

Just remove it.

=========================================

I was inspired by Colored Map Makers mod. So I wanna still give a credit to Forsaken32!

Feel free to leave your comments and hope you guys like it :)

=========================================

Q&A

Q: Will this be compatible with 3D Map mod?
A: Yes, because this mod has nothing to do with skyrim.ini.
author: loveltzzm
